name: SEWON 2080
description: This game tells of a teenager who survived on earth in 2080, where the earth did not look like the earth we know, where everyone fought for power and killed each other, this teenage name was named Anwar. Anwar has an inheritance plane owned by his parents, Anwar intends to leave the earth to a planet that is said to be safer than the earth, but the plane cannot be used because there are some damaged engine parts and Anwar must look for it first. to get the machine parts, Anwar had to fight a group of gunmen, because the area where the machine was already occupied by the person.
